category_description: Wall art that transforms a space. Handmade textiles and prints from visionary artists.
category_vibe: More than decoration—these are portals to other dimensions.

products.name: Sacred Geometry Mandala
products.description: Intricate mandala with the Flower of Life pattern in deep purples, golds, and teals. Hang it and watch how it becomes a focal point—a meditation in visual form. Cotton blend, machine washable.
products.tone_hint: This is a centerpiece that changes the energy of a room. Speak to its meditative quality and craftsmanship.

products.name: Psychedelic Forest
products.description: Trees that spiral into infinity, leaves that shimmer with impossible colors. Printed on soft, lightweight fabric that moves with the air. This is what the forest looks like when you really see it.
products.tone_hint: Trippy but tasteful. This is for people who see the world a little differently.

products.name: Moon Phases Banner
products.description: The lunar cycle from new moon to full and back again, illustrated with metallic gold on black fabric. A reminder that everything is cyclical, everything changes, everything returns.
products.tone_hint: Simple, elegant, meaningful. This is for moon gazers and cycle trackers.

products.name: Chakra Rainbow
products.description: Seven chakras as seven vibrant circles, aligned in a column of color. Red at the root, violet at the crown. Whether you work with chakras or just love rainbows, this piece radiates energy.
products.tone_hint: Respect the spiritual tradition without preaching. This is beautiful whether you work with chakras or not.

products.name: Desert Night Sky
products.description: A photo print of the Milky Way stretching over red rock desert. No light pollution, just stars and stone. Hang this and remember how small and vast we are.
products.tone_hint: This is about awe and perspective. Let the image speak for itself.

products.name: Om Symbol - Vintage Blue
products.description: The Om symbol in faded indigo on cream cotton. Hand-block printed using traditional Indian methods. The imperfections are the point—this is handmade, human, real.
products.tone_hint: Traditional craft with a lived-in feel. This is for people who value authenticity over perfection.

products.name: Fractal Dimension
products.description: A computer-generated fractal printed in stunning detail. Infinite patterns within patterns, all in electric blues, purples, and pinks. Stare long enough and you'll fall in.
products.tone_hint: This is for math heads and visual trippers. The precision is part of the beauty.

products.name: Hamsa Hand - Turquoise
products.description: The protective Hamsa hand adorned with intricate patterns, printed in turquoise and gold. A symbol of protection and blessing that crosses cultures and centuries.
products.tone_hint: Ancient symbol, modern aesthetic. This is about bringing positive energy into your space.
